Sticky Footer¶

A footer with an background different from the body’s looks ugly if the content is too short and the footer is not at the bottom of the page. There are some CSS workarounds which are unflexible.

This module uses the Sticky Footer JavaScript plugin.

SASS¶

@mixin stickyfooter($parent:"html")

The current element “sticks” at the bottom of the $parent element if the content is too short.

$parent

Selector for the parent element containing the content (not preprocessed because it looks only for parent elements).
